1.name: Dad
1.text: I've deposited EarnedCash into your bank account.

2.name: Dad
2.text: Taking away what you've spent, you should now have BankCash in the bank.

3.name: Dad
3.text: Anyways, what do you need from me?

6.name: Dad
6.text: Well, good luck with your adventure and whatnot.

7.name: Dad
7.text: Just remember to take a break once in a while, okay?
